short_summary: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a non-recurring requirement for one (1) resource. Specifically one (1) 3.3 Senior (Level 3) Project Leader/Executive in support of the Director Maritime Equipment Program Management (DMEPM).
description: The Department of National Defence has a non-recurring requirement for the provision of one (1) resource through the Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) Supply Arrangement (SA). Specifically one (1) 3.3 Senior (Level 3) Project Leader/Executive in support of the Director Maritime Equipment Program Management (DMEPM).
full_summary:
### Government Tender Notice - Project Leader/Executive in Support of DMEPM

**Notice Details**

* **Notice Reference Number**: PW-23-01029039
* **Notice ID**: W8482-231072/A
* **Publication Date**: 2023-03-03
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-03-17T14:00:00 (expired)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)

**Project Description**

The Department of National Defence has a non-recurring requirement for a 3.3 Senior (Level 3) Project Leader/Executive in support of the Director Maritime Equipment Program Management (DMEPM). This requirement is open only to those Supply Arrangement Holders (SA) under E60ZT-18TSPS who qualified under “Tier 1” ($0 - $3.75M) for the category: 3.3 Senior (Level 3) Project Leader/Executive.

**Trade Agreements**

This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

**Contract Details**

* **Contract Period**: From Date of Contract to 31 March 2025, followed by three (3) option periods of one (1) year each.
* **Estimated Level of Effort**: Initial Contract Period: 480 hours; Option Periods: 240 hours per year.
* **File Number**: W8482-231072/A

**Eligibility**

The eligibility requirements for this tender are as follows:

* SA Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS have been invited to submit a proposal.
* Interested suppliers who are not SA Holders can contact the Contracting Authority to request an invitation to bid.

**Submission Instructions**

Further instructions for submitting proposals can be obtained from:
Elona Brati
A/D Mar P 3-2-3
DMarP3BidSubmission-DOMar3Soumissiondesoffres@forces.gc.ca
